translation.en: You see, our story actually begins here,
translation.zh: ‎我们的故事其实是从这里开始的

translation.en: in the Land of Frozen Food…

translation.zh: ‎在那里 冰淇淋从不融化

translation.en: and dreams, well, they get frozen, too.
This is Waffles. And her little buddy right there?
translation.zh: ‎这位是松饼 ‎她的小伙伴也在那？

translation.en: Two best friends with one big dream,
translation.zh: ‎两位好朋友有一个大大的梦想

translation.en: But let's just say their cooking was a little on the…
translation.zh: ‎但是话说回来 他们的厨艺实在有点…

translation.en: But those two, they kept at it.

translation.zh: ‎你知道这个可以做什么吗？ ‎做点刨冰
‎直到有一天 有一样东西

translation.en: Our store's truck had gotten stuck in the snow.
translation.zh: ‎我们商店的货车被困在了雪地里

translation.en: Do you think that truck is going somewhere with real, live, fresh food?
translation.zh:
‎你是不是觉得那辆货车是在往哪里
‎运送真正的、活的、新鲜的食物？

translation.en: We've gotta have courage, Mochi, or we'll never learn how to cook.
translation.zh:
‎我们需要勇气 麻薯
‎否则我们永远无法真正学会烹饪

translation.en: You know what? Let's blow this Popsicle stand.
translation.zh: ‎你知道吗？ ‎吹倒冰棒车 然后出发

translation.en: [woman] And just like that, Waffles and Mochi set off
translation.zh: ‎就这样 ‎松饼和麻薯开始了他们人生中

translation.en: on the tastiest adventure of their lives.
translation.zh: ‎松饼和麻薯开始了他们人生中 ‎最美味的冒险

translation.en: -[Waffles] Mochi, are we there yet? -[Mochi meeps]
♪ And eat your parents With Waffles & Mochi ♪
translation.zh:
‎和松饼与麻薯一起
‎把爸爸妈妈吃掉吧

translation.en: look at all this fresh food.
Well, my dad is a frozen waffle.
This is my best friend Mochi, I'm Waffles.
translation.zh: ‎这是我的好朋友麻薯 我是松饼

translation.en: It's all right. We'll get this cleaned up.
translation.zh: ‎没关系 我们会收拾干净的

translation.en: Oh. All right. That's me. Here we go.
translation.zh: ‎好的 到我了 让我来吧
‎等等 广播 货架谢尔菲…

translation.en: Well, nice to meet ya, Steve.
translation.zh: ‎好吧 见到你很高兴 史蒂夫

translation.en: This place is so cool. What do you all do here?
translation.zh:
‎这地方真酷
‎嗨 你们都在这里做什么？

translation.en: Huh! That's easy. We work here!
translation.zh: ‎很简单啊 我们在这里工作！

translation.en: Uh! Can we work here, too?
You'll have to ask our store owner.
She's the one to ask about working here.
translation.zh: ‎要在这里工作需要她的同意
‎你可以在楼上的花园找到她
‎哦 你们好 松饼和麻薯

translation.en: -What can I do for ya? -We wanna work in the supermarket.
translation.zh:
‎-有什么可以帮助你们的吗？
‎-我们想在超市工作

translation.en: Have you worked in a supermarket before?
-No. -Okay. Have you ever had a job before?
translation.zh:
‎-没有
‎-好吧 ‎好吧 你们之前工作过吗？

translation.en: Do you even know what a job is?
Why don't we give you a chance?
-We'd love that. -Let's start with something simple.
translation.zh:
‎-好 我们很愿意
‎-让我们从简单的开始吧

‎-好 听起来很棒
‎-好 那我们开始吧

translation.en: What a beautiful basket of clown noses.
-[murmurs] -I picked them fresh from the garden.
All you have to do is go downstairs and put them where they belong.
translation.zh: ‎所以你们需要做的就是下楼 ‎把它们放在应该在的位置

translation.en: No way they'll be able to do this.
-Can you do that? -No problemo, Mrs. Obama.
translation.zh:
‎-能做到吗？
‎-没问题 奥巴马夫人

‎-好极了 行 去吧
‎-好的

translation.en: Jeez, I wish we had something that could move this, like a…
translation.zh:
‎天啊 希望有什么可以
‎帮助我们搬动它 ‎滑板或者旱冰鞋之类的…

translation.en: like a skateboard or a roller skate or a…
Looks like they're gonna take the MagiCart.
translation.zh: ‎看起来他们要用魔法马车了

translation.en: Um, hi, magical super shopping cart of our dreams.
translation.zh: ‎嗨 梦想中的超级魔法购物马车

translation.en: I see you need help finding out where tomatoes belong.
translation.zh:
‎看来你需要我帮忙找到
‎西红柿该放的位置

translation.en: Please put on your safety gear and seat belts.
translation.zh: ‎请佩戴好安全装置和安全带

translation.en: What? We need to do all that? Aren't we just going downstairs?
translation.zh: ‎什么？我们要做这些吗？ ‎我们不是就下个楼吗？

translation.en: I think we need to gear up.
translation.zh: ‎麻薯 我觉得我们应该佩戴好

translation.en: [MagiCart] Our first stop is Oakland, California,
translation.zh:
‎我们的第一站是
‎加利福尼亚州的奥克兰市

translation.en: where you'll meet Chef Samin Nosrat from the TV show Salt Fat Acid Heat.
translation.zh:
‎在那你将见到撒曼·努斯拉特 ‎在《盐、脂肪、酸与热量》
‎电视节目中出现的厨师

translation.en: -I'm Waffles, and this is Mochi. -Oh, hi. I'm Samin.
translation.zh: ‎我是松饼 这位是麻薯 ‎嗨 我是撒曼
‎嗨 撒曼 ‎你们是新邻居吗？

translation.en: -No. We're figuring out where we belong. -[murmurs]
translation.zh: ‎不 我们还不清楚我们属于哪里

translation.en: What we need to figure out is where tomatoes belong.
translation.zh: ‎我要弄清楚的是 西红柿属于什么

translation.en: Have you had a tomato before?
translation.zh: ‎好吧 你们吃过西红柿吗？

translation.en: -No. -Would you like to taste one of these?
One of my favorite kinds. Cherry tomatoes.
translation.zh:
‎这是我最喜欢的品种之一
‎这些是圣女果
‎它们很小 就像是樱桃一样

‎-给你 这个给你尝尝
‎-谢谢

‎-这个给你 麻薯
‎-给麻薯一个

translation.en: -[Wafles gasps] -[Samin] What does that taste like?
It's juicy, and it burst in my mouth.
translation.zh: ‎很多汁 感觉在我的嘴里爆开了

translation.en: Is this the first time you had a fresh tomato?
translation.zh: ‎这是你们第一次吃新鲜西红柿吗？

translation.en: It really is. I don't know how to process it.
translation.zh:
‎是的 我甚至现在都不知道
‎该怎么反应了

translation.en: There are actually 10,000 varieties of tomatoes around the world.
translation.zh:
‎其实 世界上有一万多种
‎西红柿的品种

translation.en: So, people all over the world cook them in all different ways.
translation.zh:
‎因此 世界各地的人们用不同的方式
‎烹饪西红柿

translation.en: Yeah. Do you wanna see the other tomatoes I picked?
translation.zh:
‎是的 你想看
‎我摘的另一种西红柿吗？

translation.en: Let's do it. And you know who else is gonna come join us?
translation.zh:
‎来吧
‎你知道还有谁会和我们一起吗？

translation.en: [gasps] Hi, Mia. I'm Waffles, and this is Mochi.
translation.zh: ‎嗨 米娅 我是松饼 这位是麻薯

‎-来吧 米娅 我们走
‎-我们走

translation.en: Do you know what a fruit is?
Do I know what a fruit is? Of course I do.
It's a thingamajig that you put on your shelf and admire.
translation.zh:
‎就算是一种
‎你可以放在货架上然后欣赏的东西

translation.en: Yeah, but can't you eat cheese pizza, too?
translation.zh:
‎是的 但是芝士披萨
‎你同样可以吃 对吧？

translation.en: It's something that, when you cut it, the seeds are inside.
translation.zh:
‎是一种东西 当你切开的时候
‎里面有籽

translation.en: I'll squirt some in your mouth. [Samin squeaks]
Do you think there's gonna be seeds on the inside of the tomatoes?
translation.zh: ‎所以你们认为西红柿里面会有籽吗？

translation.en: [Samin] Do you see all those tiny seeds?
It's got seeds on the inside, Mochi.
It means that a tomato's a fruit.
translation.zh: ‎这意味着 西红柿是一种水果

translation.en: Ah! A tomato is a fruit.
Are you guys ready to make some pasta with tomato candy?
translation.zh:
‎你们准备好用番茄糖
‎做意大利面了吗？

‎-糖？
‎-对的 每个人都有任务

translation.en: Waffles, you're in charge of the cheese.
-I need you to grate it. -All right.
Keep grating, and don't stop until I tell you you're done.
translation.zh: ‎一直磨 我告诉你停你再停

translation.en: Mia, we're gonna put a bunch of tomatoes in this bowl.
translation.zh:
‎米娅 我们要把这些西红柿
‎放进这个碗里

translation.en: -[Mia] Watch out, Mochi. -Grating cheese is like a workout.
translation.zh: ‎小心 麻薯 ‎磨碎芝士有点像是一项锻炼

translation.en: -[Mia] Good job, Waffles. -Now, we're gonna put some salt,
translation.zh: ‎做得好 松饼 ‎现在 我们要放一些盐

translation.en: and some olive oil to help make it stick.
translation.zh: ‎还有一些橄榄油 让它们变得粘稠

translation.en: That's gonna make the tomatoes extra delicious.
translation.zh: ‎这会让西红柿变得更加美味

translation.en: Now, we're gonna put 'em in our oven.
translation.zh: ‎现在我们要把这些放进烤箱

translation.en: In the meantime, we can get everything else ready.
translation.zh: ‎同时 我们可以把其他东西准备好

translation.en: Sorry, Mochi. I'm resting my arm.
translation.zh: ‎对不起 麻薯 我只是在放松胳膊

translation.en: Mia, will you help pick the basil?
translation.zh: ‎米娅 你能帮我摘一些罗勒叶吗？

translation.en: All we have to do now is cook the pasta.
translation.zh: ‎我们现在要做的就是煮意大利面

translation.en: I think you did it all.
The pasta might be ready. Should we check?
translation.zh:
‎我觉得意大利面好了
‎我们看看吧？

translation.en: Mia, will you help by adding the basil into the bowl?
translation.zh: ‎米娅 能帮我把罗勒叶放进碗里吗

translation.en: Now, we can add our last ingredient.
translation.zh: ‎现在 让我们加入最后一样配料

translation.en: [Samin] Wait till you taste 'em. They taste like candy.
translation.zh:
‎等着尝尝看 ‎-好了
‎-因为它们尝起来很像糖

translation.en: We should put the whole tray in.
-Should I just dump it in? -Dump it all!
translation.zh:
‎-好 我能直接倒进去吗？
‎-倒进去吧！

translation.en: -[Waffles laughs] -Know what the finishing touch is?
-[Mia] Cheese! -[Samin] Time to have a bite.
-Don't tomatoes taste like candy? -[Waffles] That is amazing.
translation.zh:
‎-西红柿尝起来不像糖吗？
‎-太好吃了

translation.en: I can't believe we just met, and now we're eating together.
translation.zh:
‎我不敢相信我们刚刚才遇到
‎现在就一起在这里吃东西了

translation.en: That's what cooking and eating together can do.
translation.zh: ‎一起烹饪和享受美食的作用正在于此

translation.en: And now we know where tomatoes belong.
translation.zh: ‎我们现在知道西红柿属于哪里了

translation.en: ♪ And I wouldn't be if I could ♪
♪ Put me in a certain aisle ♪
♪ Like there's no more to discover ♪
♪ But you gotta read my whole book ♪
♪ Not just look at the cover ♪
♪ People take one look at me And they think they know who I am ♪
translation.zh: ‎人们看了我一眼 ‎就以为知道我是谁

translation.en: ♪ But I'm here to say Once and for all ♪
♪ 'Cause I'm here to say, at last ♪
♪ And no matter What kind of tomato you are ♪
♪ Sliced or diced or in a jar ♪
♪ In ketchup or on a salad bar ♪
♪ 'Cause I'm here to say, at last ♪
[Waffles] Mochi, I can't believe we just ate food that was not frozen.
translation.zh:
‎麻薯 我不敢相信
‎我们刚刚吃了不是冷冻的食物

translation.en: Look at those tomatoes, Mochi. Should we go inside?
translation.zh: ‎看看这些西红柿 麻薯 ‎我们要进去吗？

translation.en: So, we saw a tomato outside.
Is this a tomato restaurant? Can we order tomatoes?
translation.zh:
‎这里是西红柿餐厅吗？
‎可以点西红柿吗？
‎披萨 我们喜欢冷冻披萨

translation.en: You have come to the best place to eat pizza.
translation.zh: ‎你们来到了吃披萨的最佳餐厅

translation.en: -[Waffles] They make pizza here? -They make the best pizza.
translation.zh: ‎在这儿做披萨？ ‎他们在这里制作最棒的披萨

translation.en: -Hey, what are you doing with your hands? -I'm talking with my hands,
translation.zh: ‎嗨 你的手在干什么？ ‎我在用手交流

translation.en: because everyone who works here is Deaf,
translation.zh: ‎因为这里的职员都是失聪人士

translation.en: and they communicate by using their hands.
What does it mean when you're Deaf?
What it means when you're Deaf-- It means you can't hear.
translation.zh: ‎一个人失聪了 就听不到声音了

translation.en: You don't use your ears to hear.
You use your eyes to hear.
So, everyone here uses their hands to talk?
translation.zh: ‎所以这里每个人都用手语说话吗？

translation.en: That's right. What's your favorite pizza?
translation.zh: ‎是的 你最喜欢什么披萨？

translation.en: [Katie translates] The Margherita is the most delicious because of the sauce,
translation.zh:
‎玛格丽特披萨是最好吃的
‎因为它的酱料

translation.en: and the sauce is pretty much just tomato.
translation.zh: ‎它的酱料的原料 基本上只有西红柿

translation.en: I had no idea so much tomato went into pizza.
translation.zh:
‎我不知道那么多西红柿
‎都被用去做披萨了

translation.en: Do you know what I think is the coolest part about this restaurant?
translation.zh:
‎你知道我觉得这家餐厅
‎最棒的地方是哪里吗？

translation.en: The staff uses their hands to communicate,
but they're also using their hands
and the food are the same.
-This is Amanda. This is her place. -Hi.
translation.zh:
‎-这是阿曼达 这是她的位置
‎-嗨
‎阿曼达 你怎么表示“披萨”

translation.en: It's all melted together and warm. Mochi, get in on this.
translation.zh: ‎配料都融在一起 热热的 ‎麻薯 来一起尝尝这个吧

translation.en: -[Waffles] What did you think, bud? -[Mochi trilling]
Wow, so awesome that tomatoes are fruits.
translation.zh: ‎西红柿这个水果也太好吃了

translation.en: As soon as we put tomatoes in the fruit section,
translation.zh: ‎只要我们把西红柿放在水果区

translation.en: we get to stay at the grocery store forever.
translation.zh: ‎我们就能在商店一直待下去了

translation.en: Well, technically, a tomato is a fruit,
translation.zh: ‎严格来说 西红柿是一种水果

translation.en: but chefs use it like it's a vegetable.
translation.zh: ‎但厨师通常把它当作蔬菜来用

translation.en: What? Wait, wait, wait. You're saying that a tomato is a vegetable?
translation.zh: ‎什么？ ‎等等 你是说 西红柿是蔬菜？

translation.en: Does it belong with the fruits? With vegetables?
[Waffles] Come on. We gotta get out of here. Vegetable fruit.
translation.zh: ‎快来 我们先从这里出去 ‎蔬菜 水果

translation.en: Oh. Excuse me. Can I take a bite for the road?
translation.zh: ‎不好意思 我能带走一块吗？

translation.en: [translating from Italian] A tomato is a fruit.
[from Japanese] Fruit, because tomatoes are sweet.
translation.zh: ‎我觉得西红柿是水果 因为它是甜的

translation.en: [from Italian] Vegetable. It's not sweet enough.
translation.zh: ‎西红柿是蔬菜 因为它不够甜

translation.en: Why? Because it has seeds inside.
MagiCart, help. We thought tomato was a fruit,
translation.zh:
‎救命 魔法马车
‎我们觉得西红柿是一种水果

translation.en: but then we heard it's a vegetable.
translation.zh: ‎但是我们刚刚听说它是一种蔬菜

translation.en: Well, a fruit is the part of a plant with seeds.
translation.zh: ‎水果是带籽的 它是植物的一部分

translation.en: Everything else, like the plant's roots, stems, and leaves, are vegetables.
translation.zh: ‎其他的东西 比如植物的根 ‎茎和叶都属于蔬菜

translation.en: You're gonna tell us where tomatoes go in the store, right?
translation.zh:
‎你现在要说 西红柿放在
‎商店里的哪个区域了 对吧？

translation.en: No, but I know just the person to ask.
translation.zh: ‎不 但是我知道可以去问谁

translation.en: Let's swing by Washington, D.C., and ask Chef José Andrés.
translation.zh:
‎让我们去华盛顿
‎问问何塞·安德烈斯吧

translation.en: He wrote the book on vegetables. Literally.
Sounds like the perfect person to ask.
translation.zh: ‎听起来 他是最合适问的人

translation.en: Would you expect anything less from me?
translation.zh: ‎你们对我的期望比这个低吗？

translation.en: Well, we don't even know you yet, MagiCart. Cool it.
translation.zh: ‎我们还不了解你呢 魔法马车 别激动

translation.en: Where are we? Oh, hey. Excuse me.

translation.zh:
‎-嗨
‎-你是何塞·安德烈斯厨师吗？

translation.en: Maybe you can help us. We're confused.
translation.zh: ‎说不定你能帮到我们 我们很困惑

translation.en: We need to put tomatoes away at the store.
translation.zh:
‎是这样的
‎我们要把西红柿放在商店里

translation.en: We learned it was a fruit, then someone told us it was a vegetable.
translation.zh:
‎我们学到它是一种水果
‎但后来有人说 是一种蔬菜

translation.en: So where does it belong, you know?
translation.zh: ‎所以它到底属于什么呢 你知道吗？

translation.en: Well, technically, technically, it's a fruit.
translation.zh: ‎严格来讲 它是一种水果

translation.en: Why? Because we use it in salads.
translation.zh: ‎为什么？因为我们用它做沙拉

translation.en: We use it in savory dishes.
So, you're saying that a tomato can be a fruit and a vegetable?
translation.zh:
‎你的意思是
‎西红柿可以是水果 也可以是蔬菜？

translation.en: Yes. And you will be right in both ways.
translation.zh: ‎是的 你说哪一种都是对的

translation.en: We're gonna make a recipe that I learned from my wife.
translation.zh: ‎我们要制作一份 ‎我从妻子那里学来的食谱

translation.en: Gazpacho is from the south of Spain.
because it's always a beautiful sun in the sky.
translation.zh: ‎因为天空中常挂着美丽的太阳

translation.en: Oh, so who wants hot soup in a hot-weather place?
translation.zh:
‎所以会有人想要在炎热的地方
‎吃热食吗？

translation.en: And then, one of my favorite ingredients.
translation.zh: ‎然后 放入我最爱的配料之一

translation.en: -What do you think is it? -Is that olive oil?
translation.zh: ‎你们觉得是什么？ ‎是橄榄油吗？

translation.en: From olives from the olive tree.
translation.zh:
‎-来自于橄榄树上的橄榄
‎-橄榄油

translation.en: You wanna honor the tradition of Spain, you put sherry vinegar.
translation.zh:
‎如果你想尊重西班牙的传统
‎你可以放雪利酒醋

translation.en: All right. So, the tomato is ready.
translation.zh: ‎好了 西红柿也准备好了

translation.en: This is what you do. You chop the tomatoes into cubes,
translation.zh: ‎这是我们做好的 ‎把西红柿切成小块

translation.en: and you put the cubes in the plate.
A bit of the olive oil,
and now we need to finish with your favorite new friend.
translation.zh:
‎我们要用你最爱的新朋友
‎来完成这道菜

translation.en: A big cut on the top,
and then you make a cut right there.
And now, you let the party begin.
translation.zh: ‎现在 让我们开始狂欢吧
‎西红柿、青椒和黄瓜  ‎它们在一起玩耍

translation.en: -Do you hear? Can you hear the sound? -[voice vocalizes softly]
translation.zh: ‎你听到了吗？你能听到声音吗？

translation.en: -[faint crackling] -All these sound is that they are happy.
translation.zh: ‎所有的声音都在表示它们很开心

translation.en: Well, we came from the Land of Frozen Foods,
translation.zh:
‎我们来自冷冻食品大陆
‎那里一切都是冷冻的 我们来了这里

translation.en: where everything was frozen and came here. We didn't know where we belonged.
translation.zh:
‎我们来自冷冻食品大陆
‎那里一切都是冷冻的 我们来了这里 ‎我们也不知道属于哪里

translation.en: is telling a lot of who I am,
translation.zh: ‎讲述了关于我是谁这个问题

translation.en: and I think it's gonna give you clues
translation.zh:
‎我希望它也可以给你们一些
‎关于你们是谁

translation.en: to finding who you are, where you're going, because,
translation.zh:
‎我希望它也可以给你们一些
‎关于你们是谁 ‎你们要去哪的线索
‎因为凉菜汤来自于西班牙

translation.en: this gazpacho is from Spain, but then,
translation.zh:
‎你们要去哪的线索
‎因为凉菜汤来自于西班牙 ‎但它大部分配料都来自世界其他地方

translation.en: many ingredients came from other parts of the world.
translation.zh: ‎但它大部分配料都来自世界其他地方

translation.en: I learned that gazpacho can be…
It belongs to a place that people gives love to the gazpacho.
translation.zh: ‎凉菜汤属于人们热爱它的地方

translation.en: Hopefully, we can figure out where we belong.
translation.zh:
‎好吧 希望我们可以找到
‎我们属于哪里

translation.en: If we listen to our food, maybe it'll tell us who we are.
translation.zh: ‎如果我们倾听食物 ‎说不定它会告诉我们属于哪里

translation.en: You two ready to put those tomatoes where they belong?
translation.zh:
‎你们准备好把西红柿
‎放在属于它的地方了吗？

translation.en: Yeah. Mochi, we've got a job to do.
translation.zh: ‎是的 麻薯 我们还有个任务要做

translation.en: All right, Mochi. Wait, you're not Mochi.
translation.zh: ‎好了 麻薯 ‎等等 你不是麻薯

translation.en: Mochi, we can put these tomatoes away. We know where they belong.
translation.zh: ‎麻薯 我们可以放置这些西红柿了 ‎我们知道放在哪了

translation.en: Wait, you think they're a vegetable?
translation.zh: ‎等等 你认为这是蔬菜吗？

translation.en: But Samin said they're a fruit.
Chef José said people use them like vegetables, but…
translation.zh:
‎我知道厨师何塞说
‎人们把它当作蔬菜来用 但是…

translation.en: [Busy] Wanted to spend time with my mentor. See the rosemary spread?
translation.zh:
‎想和我的导师待在一起
‎看到迷迭香酱了吗？

translation.en: Wow, and the bakery is really--
-Hey, you two. -Well, if it isn't Falafel and Mocha.
translation.zh:
‎-嗨 你们两个
‎-嗯 不正是煎饼和红薯吗？

translation.en: I heard somebody is trying to figure out where tomatoes go.
translation.zh:
‎我听说
‎有人要区分西红柿到底属于什么

translation.en: Well, I guess that is a choice.
translation.zh: ‎好吧 这大概是一种选择

translation.en: Not a good choice, if you ask me.
translation.zh:
‎如果你问我
‎我不认为这是好选择

translation.en: We put them everywhere because they can go anywhere.
translation.zh:
‎我们把它放在每个地方
‎因为它用处多多

translation.en: Tomatoes are a fruit because their seeds are inside.
translation.zh:
‎看 西红柿是一种水果
‎因为它们里面有籽

translation.en: But tomatoes are also a vegetable
because that's how chefs and most people use them.
translation.zh: ‎因为厨师和大部分人们常用它

translation.en: You two showed me a new way to think about tomatoes.
translation.zh:
‎你们向我展示了一种新的方式
‎来了解西红柿

translation.en: And you see, whenever an employee demonstrates a high level of mastery
translation.zh:
‎听着 每当一个职员
‎对我们的可食用食材

translation.en: of our edible inventory, they're awarded a prestigious honor.
translation.zh:
‎非常了解时
‎他们将会被授予一项莫大的荣耀

translation.en: What Busy is trying to say is that when employees around here
translation.zh: ‎忙忙想要说的是 当员工表现好

translation.en: do something good and show an expertise in something, they get a badge.
translation.zh: ‎或是展现出对某物有专业了解 ‎他们将得到一枚徽章

translation.en: So, it is my distinct honor
I want to tell you both how proud I am of you.
translation.zh:
‎我想告诉你们两位
‎我很为你们感到骄傲

translation.en: you didn't give up on finding where you belong.
translation.zh: ‎你们没有放弃寻找你们属于的地方

translation.en: And I can only imagine how you two must have felt,
that you belong, like the tomato, everywhere.
translation.zh: ‎自己就像西红柿一样 属于每个地方

translation.en: I want to reward you proudly
-[Mrs. Obama] In honor of your tenacity -[meeps]
you now belong here with us. You're a part of our family.
translation.zh: ‎你们现在和我们一起 属于这里 ‎是这个大家庭的一员

translation.en: So, where do we put these?
translation.zh: ‎所以我们要把徽章戴在哪里？

translation.en: On your official apron, of course.
-Busy. Join us. -I'll get in on it, too.
translation.zh:
‎-来吧 忙忙 和我们一起
‎-我来了
